dc_title_s: Sketch of the fort at Michilimackinac; Perks. Magra.; Title in margin: Magra map.
dc_description_s: Relief shown by hachures and shading. Facsimile. "From the original in the Clements library." Reproduced from ms. original dated 1766? Oriented with north to the bottom. Includes index of buildings. 1 map: col.; 20 x 23 cm This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
